name: network-firewall
description: Firewall Automation for Network Traffic on AWS
author: @aws-solutions

scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && rm -rf coverage && mkdir -p dist/lib/service && mkdir -p dist/lib/common/configReader
scripts.build:copy: for file in `find . -name '*.js' | egrep -v '__tests__|node_modules'`;do echo "Copying $file"; cp $file dist/$file; done
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && ls -ltRr && npm install --production
scripts.build: tsc && npm run build-init && npm run build:copy && npm run build:install
